Very good audio and video quality. +1 for embedded English subs for non-English dialogue. I used mkvmerge to remove unwanted language and convert to .mp4. For those that care, the uploader elected to place a metadata tag within the movie. Within the first few seconds of the movie, the following appears, "RIPPER~BONIIN". Not sure why the uploader chose to slap his or her verbiage on the movie but it does not take away from the overall movie. Thank you uploader. Much appreciated.
